Articles.Content: After seeing a few youtube videos on the "kollaborative warfare" I thought that it looked pretty fun, and was wondering if anyone would like to do a similar event with me or others. Mods would include kerbinside, obviously, but other mods (and rules) are up for discussion. I will also be posting this on reddit and in general ksp discussion because I don't know where this belongs.
Please don't duplicate threads. Continue the conversation in the General Discussion thread: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129459](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129459)
